wiki.weapons: retractable metal talons, a cape which helps allow him to glide
wiki.powers: has the ability to glide over short distances, acute hearing, can rotate his head 360 degrees, eyes can move independantly from each other, which allows him a greater sense of vision
wiki.bio_text: Before he started his career as a criminal mastermind, Leland Owlsley (The Owl) was a somewhat successful financial investor, until his criminal ties were exposed by the IRS. While occasionally clashing with Kingpin over territories, he also deals with Daredevil on a regular basis. Recently, the Owl has re-established his hold on the criminal underworld through distributing Mutant Growth Hormones, until he was arrested by Daredevil.
wiki.bio: Before he started his career as a criminal mastermind, Leland Owlsley (The Owl) was a somewhat successful financial investor, until his criminal ties were exposed by the IRS. While occasionally clashing with Kingpin over territories, he also deals with Daredevil on a regular basis. Recently, the Owl has re-established his hold on the criminal underworld through distributing Mutant Growth Hormones, until he was arrested by Daredevil.
